properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am without one plea, But that Thy blood was shed for me, And now You bid me come to Thee, O Lamb of God, I come. I come.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am, and waiting not To rid my soul of one dark blot, To Thee whose blood can cleanse each spot, O Lamb of God, I come. I come.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am though tossed about With many a conflict, many a doubt, Fightings within and fears without, O Lamb of God, I come. I come.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am You wilt receive, Wilt welcome, pardon, cleanse, relieve, Because Thy promise I believe, O Lamb of God, I come. I come.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
